::Perndabot::

Perndabot chuckles. "That's allright. You can have someone escort me 
if you want, but even psychotic bots rarely attack me."

The very large bot powers up his jetpack, hovering a few feet of the 
ground. "Contact Zardus when your allies arrive. I'll inform Zardus 
of the agreement we reached."

And with that, Perndabot turns around and boosts off, flying toward 
the Iron Fist.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate::
> 
> "Right" said Darkfate "By now, your leader had my promise of no 
> agression-deal, just when I've spoken with my allies and I speak 
with 
> Zardus I can say that it's a alliance... If you have inconvenient 
one 
> of my probes will follow you while you're in my territory -I have 
> several psicotic bots and I don't like a fight when a good alliance 
> it's around. "
